languages.text: Огонь вновь запылал в домнах, станки наполнили воздух визгом, маг-поезда вагонеток вереницами тянутся из цеха в цех. Но в самые глубокие палаты мануфакторума теперь нет хода никому, кроме избранных — там, во тьме, крови и тайне, куются еретические орудия Хаоса.

traits.locale_text: Огонь вновь запылал в домнах, станки наполнили воздух визгом, маг-поезда вагонеток вереницами тянутся из цеха в цех. Но в самые глубокие палаты мануфакторума теперь нет хода никому, кроме избранных — там, во тьме, крови и тайне, куются еретические орудия Хаоса.

languages.text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.
languages.original_text: Огонь вновь запылал в домнах, станки наполнили воздух визгом, маг-поезда вагонеток вереницами тянутся из цеха в цех. Но в самые глубокие палаты мануфакторума теперь нет хода никому, кроме избранных — там, во тьме, крови и тайне, куются еретические орудия Хаоса.

traits.locale_text: Blast furnaces are lit once again, machines fill the air with screeches and squeals and wagon trains stretch in lines from one factory to another. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Chaos Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness and secrecy.

Blast furnaces are lit once again, machines fill the air with screeches and squeals and wagon trains stretch in lines from one factory to another. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Chaos Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness and secrecy.

The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical engines of Chaos are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical engines of Chaos are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

languages.text: 高炉被再次点燃，空气中再次充斥着机器尖锐的摩擦声，磁力列车的车厢也再次从一个车间开向了另一个车间。但如今，除了那些被挑选出来的人之外，没人可以进入制造工厂深处的房间。在制造工厂深处的黑暗与血腥之中，邪恶的恶魔引擎正在被秘密地锻造出来。
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

traits.locale_text: 高炉被再次点燃，空气中再次充斥着机器尖锐的摩擦声，磁力列车的车厢也再次从一个车间开向了另一个车间。但如今，除了那些被挑选出来的人之外，没人可以进入制造工厂深处的房间。在制造工厂深处的黑暗与血腥之中，混沌的邪恶机器正在被秘密地锻造出来。

languages.text: Los grandes hornos vuelven a arder, las máquinas llenan el aire de chirridos y crujidos otra vez y magnetotrén tras magnetotrén circula de un taller a otro. Pero solo a los elegidos se les permite entrar a lo más profundo del manufactorum. Es allí donde ahora se forjan los ingenios daemónicos de los herejes con sangre, en la oscuridad y en el más absoluto secreto.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

traits.locale_text: Los grandes hornos vuelven a arder, las máquinas llenan el aire de chirridos y crujidos otra vez y magnetotrén tras magnetotrén circula de un taller a otro. Pero solo a los elegidos se les permite entrar a lo más profundo del manufactorum. Es allí donde ahora se forjan las máquinas herejes del Caos en sangre, en la oscuridad y en el más absoluto secreto.

languages.text: Die Hochöfen brennen wieder, die Luft ist wieder vom Kreischen und Ächzen der Maschinen erfüllt und scheinbar endlose Magnetzüge fahren von einer Werkstätte zur anderen. Aber niemand außer den Auserkorenen hat Zugang zu den tieferen Kammern des Manufactorums – wo mittlerweile ketzerische Dämonenmaschinen in Blut, Dunkelheit und Heimlichkeit geschmiedet werden.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

traits.locale_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical engines of Chaos are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

languages.text: À nouveau, les hauts-fourneaux rugissent, les machines emplissent l'air de leur vacarme, et les trains magnétiques alignent leurs wagons d'un poste de production à l'autre. Toutefois, nul à l'exception de certains élus n'est autorisé à pénétrer dans les salles les plus profondes du manufactorum où les machines-démons sont désormais secrètement forgées dans le sang et les ténèbres.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

traits.locale_text: À nouveau, les hauts-fourneaux rugissent, les machines emplissent l'air de leur vacarme, et les trains magnétiques alignent leurs wagons d'un poste de production à l'autre. Toutefois, nul à l'exception de certains élus n'est autorisé à pénétrer dans les salles les plus profondes du manufactorum où les moteurs hérétiques du Chaos sont désormais secrètement forgés dans le sang et les ténèbres.

languages.text: 高炉は再び点火して、機械はまたもやキーキー、ギシギシという音で空気を満たし、ワゴンの磁力列車が作業場から作業場へと列になって伸びる。しかし、選ばれし者以外は聖工場の奥深くに入ることは許されていない…ここは今や、魔導兵器が血と闇と秘密にまみれて鍛造している場所なのだ。
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.

traits.locale_text: 高炉は再び点火して、機械はまたもやキーキー、ギシギシという音で空気を満たし、ワゴンの磁力列車が作業場から作業場へと列になって伸びる。しかし、選ばれし者以外は聖工場の奥深くに入ることは許されていない…ここは今や、魔導兵器が血と闇と秘密にまみれて鍛造している場所なのだ。

languages.text: Yüksek fırınlar yeniden yakıldı, makineler bir kez daha havayı tiz seslerle ve cırlamalarla dolduruyor ve manyetik trenlerin vagonları bir atölyeden diğerine sıralar oluşturuyor. Ancak manufaktorum en derin odalarına seçilmiş kişiler dışındakilerin girmesine izin verilmiyor. Burada artık kanla, karanlıkla ve gizlilikle kâfir İblis Motorları dövülüyor.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But no one except the chosen are allowed into the deeper chambers of the manufactorum — this is where heretical Daemon Engines are now being forged in blood, darkness, and secrecy.
